text: Monday Morning in a Coney Island Police Court is a 1908 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithMonday Morning in a Coney Island Police CourtMonday Morning in a Coney Island Police Court and stars John R. Cumpson, Harry Solter, and Edward Dillon. ==Actors== * John R. Cumpson as Honorable Patrick McPheeney * Harry Solter as McPheeney's Aide * Edward Dillon * George Gebhardt as Happy Hooligan Character * Robert Harron as Young Man * Dell Henderson * Anthony O'Sullivan as Ignatius O'Brien, Attorney * Mack Sennett as Policeman ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Monday Morning in a Coney Island Police Court
